buildCommand: npm run sync:env && cd frontend && npm run build

env._comment: Required environment variables for Vite build. Set these in Vercel dashboard: Settings > Environment Variables
env._VITE_SUPABASE_URL: Supabase project URL (required for SaaS mode)
env._VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: Supabase anonymous key (required for SaaS mode)

headers.value: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version, Authorization
